short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An all encapsulating chrome extension which can do your AP Computer Science homework like a champ.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you click on the extension, you can click on a few buttons which each solve a certain type of problem on the CSAwesome textbook.

Problems it can solve:
- All MCQs (yes, that includes multiple select MCQs too)
- Simple Drag-N-Drops (<6 blocks)
- Can't solve code blocks but it can run every code block on the page for free points

Some things to keep in mind:
- Problems are solved by trying every possible answer choice and checking it
- Code problems cannot be solved, but there is a button that runs all the code blocks on the current page for free points
- Drag-N-Drop problems have a LOT of possible arrangements and will crash your browser if you calculate every possibility. If you want to automate these, you must solve the first couple of blocks (must be correct) from the left side into the right side, then the extension will be able to solve the rest (extension can only solve 5 or fewer blocks)
